commandobject.name: MoveCamera
commandobject.documentation: Moves with the player that was previously set as a camera.

property.name: Id
property.documentation: UnrealId of the player that is a camera and that we want to move.

property.name: Destination
property.documentation: Final destination where the camera should move.

property.name: Direction
property.documentation: Vector that sets direction of the move of this camera.

property.name: Speed
property.documentation: Set the speed of the move of this camera.

property.name: Time
property.documentation: How long this move of this camera will last (in seconds).
